messages.title: REVEALED: Tories to make North East top target for cuts
messages.content: The leaflet suggests that the Conservative party has plans to target the North East for public spending cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet implies a strategic consideration for voters in the North East to remember past events and to vote accordingly in order to avoid the Tory plans.

issues.economy: The leaflet mentions public spending cuts in the North East and suggests an economic impact on the region.

images.caption: An image with text about the Conservative party's alleged plans for cuts in the North East.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The text is taken from a news source and is used to criticize the Conservative party's alleged plans. It is part of Labour's campaign to encourage voting for their party.
